mapper.select: select from tel_protection left join tel_partner on tel_protection.id = tel_partner.tel_id left join sys_company on sys_company.id = tel_partner.partner_id where tel_protection.final_cus_id = #{finalCusId}

select id,name,contacts,tel,tel_id,is_bind from (SELECT sys_company.id,sys_company.name,sys_company.contacts,sys_company.tel,IF(tel_partner.tel_id = #{telId},1,-1) is_bind,tel_partner.tel_id from sys_company LEFT JOIN tel_partner on sys_company.id = tel_partner.partner_id ) _now where tel_id is null or tel_id not in( select tel_id from (SELECT sys_company.id,sys_company.name,sys_company.contacts,sys_company.tel,IF(tel_partner.tel_id = #{telId},1,-1) is_bind,tel_partner.tel_id from sys_company LEFT JOIN tel_partner on sys_company.id = tel_partner.partner_id ) _s where is_bind = -1 and tel_id is not null and id in( select id from ( SELECT sys_company.id,sys_company.name,sys_company.contacts,sys_company.tel, IF(tel_partner.tel_id = #{telId},1,-1) is_bind,tel_partner.tel_id from sys_company LEFT JOIN tel_partner on sys_company.id = tel_partner.partner_id ) _t where is_bind = 1 ) ) GROUP BY id order by is_bind desc

select _now.id,_now.uid,_now.username,_now.is_bind,_now.tel from( select tel_protection.id,sys_user.uid,sys_user.username, IF(tel_protection.tel = #{tel},1,-1) is_bind,tel_protection.tel from sys_user left join sys_user_role on sys_user.uid = sys_user_role.user_id left join tel_protection on sys_user.uid = tel_protection.final_cus_id WHERE sys_user_role.role_id = 7 ) _now where id is null or id not in( select id from ( select id,uid,username,is_bind,tel from ( select tel_protection.id,sys_user.uid,sys_user.username, IF(tel_protection.tel = #{tel},1,-1) is_bind,tel_protection.tel from sys_user left join sys_user_role on sys_user.uid = sys_user_role.user_id left join tel_protection on sys_user.uid = tel_protection.final_cus_id WHERE sys_user_role.role_id = 7 ) _old where is_bind = -1 and id is not null and uid in ( select uid from (select tel_protection.id,sys_user.uid,sys_user.username, IF(tel_protection.tel = #{tel},1,-1) is_bind,tel_protection.tel from sys_user left join sys_user_role on sys_user.uid = sys_user_role.user_id left join tel_protection on sys_user.uid = tel_protection.final_cus_id WHERE sys_user_role.role_id = 7 ) _s where is_bind = 1 ) ) _t ) group by id ORDER BY is_bind desc
